post:
Hello all!

We're back again with a new and different offers with dedicated servers starting from just $20/mo in LAX & MIA. If the offers below aren't up to your requirements please just contact one of our sales staff and we can provide a whole host of options.

Be aware all servers are manually setup and it may take up to 3 business days.

##Los Angeles

<pre>Intel X3430 (or similar)
16GB DDR3 RAM
2x2TB HDD 
10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit (swap to 100Mbit unmetered for $5/mo extra)
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>
[$30/mo](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=212&currency=2)

<pre>Dual Intel Xeon X5650
64GB DDR3 RAM
2TB HDD + Free 120GB SSD upgrade
10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>
[$49/mo](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=203&currency=2)

**Asian Optimised Bandwidth Offer**
<pre>Intel Core2Quad Q9000 series
16GB DDR2 RAM
2TB HDD
5TB Asian Optimised Bandwidth @ 1Gbit (CN2 GT, China Unicom, China Mobile (NEW!))
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>
[$27.50/mo ](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=211&currency=2)

##Miami
<pre>
Intel i3-2130 (or similar)
8GB DDR3 RAM
1TB HDD
10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit (swap to 100Mbit unmetered for $5/mo extra)
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>

[$25/mo](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=200&currency=2), $20 with promo code G4U43LW5XX





##Location Information
LAX - Test IP (69.12.66.26/2607:fcd0:0:a::2) - Test Files ([100MB](http://repos.lax-noc.com/speedtests/100mb.bin) [1GB](http://repos.lax-noc.com/speedtests/1gb.bin))
MIA - Test IP (173.44.32.10/2607:ff48:0:a:b:c:d:666) - Test Files ([100MB](http://repos.mia.lax-noc.com/speedtests/100mb.bin) [1GB](http://repos.mia.lax-noc.com/speedtests/1gb.bin))

##Additional Information
All services benefit from Quadranets 3Gbit VEST DDoS protection and benefit from their enterprise grade network. All services are eligible for BGP sessions and bring your own IP. Our in-house server control panel is currently not available and is being worked on and should be ready in ~2 weeks to allow users to reboot, reinstall and manage their IPs.
